name: Mary D Schultz Winer
part_bio: Mrs. Mary Winer, who has been spending the past few months at the home of her daughter, Mrs. David Jones, northeast of the village, dropped dead in the yard Friday morning as the result of an attack of apoplexy. The deceased was 73 years of age and came here from her home in Crediton, Ontario. The remains were taken to that place Saturday and were accompanied by Mrs. Jones and Wesley Winer, a son of the deceased.www.sandusky.lib.mi.ushistoric obituaries Contributor: Terri (Haupt) Huizenga (48881555) • [email protected]
bio:
MATHEW WINER DIED MAR 26, 1910
AGED 71 YRS. 9 MOS
HIS WIFE MARY SCHULTZ
DIED JUNE 2, 1911
AGED 72 YRS. 2 MOS
THEIR DAU LILLY ANN
DIED DEC 10, 1901
AGED 20 YRS. 9 MOS
Gone But Not Forgotten
